==Japanese==

===Kanji===
{{ja-kanji|grade=uc|rs=戈10}}

# to [[cut]], to [[sever]]

====Readings====
{{ja-readings
|goon=[[ぜち]] (zechi)
|kanon=[[せつ]] (setsu)
|kanyoon=[[さい]] (sai)
|kun=[[たつ|た.つ]] ({{ja-l|截つ}}, tatsu), [[きる|き.る]] ({{ja-l|截る}}, kiru)
}}

===Etymology 1===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=せつ}} {{m|ltc|截|tr=*dzhet}}. Compare modern {{cog|yue|截|tr=zit<sup>6</sup>}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}, specifically [[漢音#Japanese|''kan'on'']]
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[se̞t͡sɯᵝ]}}

====Affix====
{{ja-pos|affix|せつ}}

# [[section]]
# [[cut]]
# [[sever]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-l|截枝|せっし|sesshi}}: a method of [[pruning]], whereby tree branches are removed to prompt new growth at the site of the old branches
* {{ja-l|截取|せっしゅ|sesshu}}: [[cutting]] [[off]], cutting [[away]]
* {{ja-l|截然|せつぜん|setsuzen}}: clearly [[delineated]], clearly [[distinct]]; clearly [[cut]] [[away]]
* {{ja-l|截断|せつだん|setsudan}}: [[cutting]] something out, off, or away; [[amputation]]; a [[section]] or [[cross-section]], as in [[mathematics]]
* {{ja-l|截断言|せつだんげん|setsudangen}}: archaic term for {{m|ja|終止形|tr=shūshikei||terminal form}}
* {{ja-l|截頭|せっとう|settō}}: a clipped point, as when a leaf or flower-petal tip is snipped
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-l|直截|ちょくせつ|chokusetsu}}: [[direct]], [[straightforward]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
Probably originally a misreading based on this character's visual and semantic similarity to {{ja-l|裁}}, commonly read as ''sai''.

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}: specifically [[慣用読み#Japanese|''kan'yōyomi'']]
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[sa̠i]}}

====Affix====
{{ja-pos|affix|さい}}

# [[section]]
# [[cut]]
# [[sever]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-l|截金|さいきん|saikin}}: thin layers of [[gold leaf]] cut into various shapes
* {{ja-l|截然|さいぜん|saizen}}: clearly [[delineated]], clearly [[distinct]]
* {{ja-l|截断|さいだん|saidan}}: [[distinction]] between [[right]] and [[wrong]]; [[cutting]] cloth, paper, or some other substance into a defined pattern or shape
* {{ja-l|截留|さいりゅう|sairyū}}: [[embezzlement]] by government officials in ancient Japan
* {{ja-l|截癱|さいなん|sainan}}: a kind of [[motor]] [[paralysis]] in the lower leg or lower torso, due to [[spinal]] [[damage]] or chronic [[alcoholism]]
{{der-bottom}}
